comment: Definitely a class with a lot of assignment, but she was such a wonderful grader and I really respected her feedback on different projects that I didn't completely understand. She's wonderful and if you have the opportunity to take a class on Archaeology, take Klabacha!

This class was not organized very clearly. We usually had to read a chapter a week and had an assignment every week, and 5 discussions overall. She wasnt a harsh grader though, but her instructions were very often not clear. Not a bad class though, there was barely any real due dates. Not a bad choice.
